itemDescription: (1834-1903) Adm. sizar at ST JOHN\\'S, July 5, 18‍53. [Eldest] s. of George, schoolmaster [and Eliza]. B. Feb. 21, 18‍34, at Christ\\'s Hospital, Hertford. [School, Christ\\'s Hospital.] Matric. Michs. 18‍53; B.A. (8 th Wrangler ) 18‍

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Henry Ludlow (1834–1903) was an English barrister and judge, Chief Justice of the Leeward Islands. He was knighted by letters patent in 1890.
